bibl.title: The Provenance of the Robinson and Mississippi Papyri
bibl.seg: Daniel B. Sharp, The Provenance of the Robinson and Mississippi Papyri.

The Robinson Papyri. - The Robinson Papyri after Willis's 1958 talk. - Robinson as a Papyrus Collector. - The Robinson Papyri Numbering System. - The Mississippi Papyri: Acquisition and Contents. - The Mississippi Papyri after 1958. - Contamination Between the Robinson and the Mississippi Papyri. - The Deaton Papyri. - More Contamination Between the Robinson and the Mississippi Papyri. - Conclusions. - Pp. 190-193: Appendix. Chart 1: Robinson Papyri housed at Duke University; - Chart 2: Items assigned a Robinson Inventory number, which likely have a different provenance.
